name: places/ChIJmwjzDApZwokRepKw_-mn44U
formattedAddress: 200e E 24th St, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 200e E 24th St, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: This is the worst parking garage ever. The manager is very rude, and disrespectful. I parked there and he handled my car very recklessly and when I told him to handle my car with care he disregarded what I had to say. It seem like he only treats women this way from the past reviews. One day someone brother, husband or boyfriend is going to knock his teeth out. He needs anger management. I will never park there again or refer anyone to go there. He needs to be replaced. What is it going to take. I made a complaint against him and his supervisor is no better.

What is it going to take. I made a complaint against him and his supervisor is no better.

originalText.text: I entered the lot at 6:50 am today and didn’t see anyone there. I waited for about 5 minutes for someone to return and then said hello!! Hello! To alert them to my presence. The guy came out and started yelling at me for saying hello and telling me to be patient. I was like bro, I’m just letting you know I’m here. Take it easy. He said, I’m not your bro and continued to berate me. I was like you really need to calm down, I was just letting you know I was here. There’s no reason to scream at me. Then he told me to never park there again. I was really dumbfounded by his viscous attitude towards me. He was so angry for no reason. I was afraid he was going to do something to my car. And I told him he better not do anything to my car. And he LITERALLY said to me, I’ll do what I want and you do what you want.

originalText.text: They did not honor my SpotHero reservation.  The attendant was downright aggressive and threatening as we tried to find other parking. Violently yelling at us and physically intimidating us. Never use this garage. Horrible experience that management is obviously doing nothing about. If he apologized and tried to help us find another location but instead he yelled at us, slammed his hand on our car and said he would call the police if we did not immediately leave. Would not tell us how to get a refund. Never use them!!!

originalText.text: RIP OFF SCAMMERS! Parked here using SpotHero, Fri, Aug 12-13. An hr before picking up car, asked the clerk to retrieve a piece of luggage in the trunk. We did. When returning, the extremely rude, mean clerk yelled at us for having taken the key with us earlier. He never mentioned to make sure to leave it, but when we now wanted to leave, he insisted on an additional $100 to let us out of the garage. Holding the car hostage, essentially. Only then did he point to a sign that wasn’t clearly posted that mentioned to leave keys in the vehicle. It was less than an hr, I showed him proof we had paid, yet he continued to yell and insist on the extra fee- 2 1/2 times the original cost. I eventually offered $40 cash, which he accepted, put in his pocket, and we left. Never park here, thieving crooks.

originalText.text: My car received a parking violation while it was parked here.  The violation is for parking on the sidewalk.  I never park at this address except to leave my car in this garage.  The parking attendant must have parked my car on the sidewalk in preparation to have it picked up.  Furthermore, the parking attendant must have disposed of the ticket placed on my car so that I wouldn't question them about the ticket.  I never saw a ticket on my car and did not know about it until I received a Pre-Penalty Notice of Unpaid Violation in the mail.  Do not park here.
